long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thank you for considering Pengwynn! 
The purpose of Pengywnn is to help you stay safe and informed while shopping online. 

This essential Chrome extension alerts you when youâ€™re visiting a low-rated site, helping you avoid scams and malicious content. It's also possible to easily access reviews on Google to make informed decisions about the sites you visit.

** To avoid misleading information, please evaluate the specified location and rating. While continuous improvements are being made to the extension, there may still be occasional mistakes and incorrect places.

Your feedback is appreciated!! We'd love to hear from you and receive your thoughts!  Feel free to reach us out on pengwynn.dev@gmail.com.

Thanks!
